pr_title: HDDS-3649. Add documentation for Cat Key Command

timeline.message: HDDS-3649. Add documentation for Cat Key Command

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            The `key cat` command copies a specific Ozone key to standard output.
          
          
            
            The `key cat` command displays the contents a specific Ozone key to standard output.
timeline.author: dineshchitlangia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -137,3 +138,19 @@ The `key rename` command changes the name of an existing key in the specified bu
 ozone sh key rename /hive/jan sales.orc new_name.orc
 {{< /highlight >}}
 The above command will rename _sales.orc_ to _new\_name.orc_ in the bucket _/hive/jan_.
+
+### Cat
+
+The `key cat` command copies a specific Ozone key to standard output.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Copies the file hello.txt from the _/hive/jan_ bucket to standard output.
          
          
            
            Displays the contents of the key hello.txt from the _/hive/jan_ bucket to standard output.
timeline.author: dineshchitlangia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -137,3 +138,19 @@ The `key rename` command changes the name of an existing key in the specified bu
 ozone sh key rename /hive/jan sales.orc new_name.orc
 {{< /highlight >}}
 The above command will rename _sales.orc_ to _new\_name.orc_ in the bucket _/hive/jan_.
+
+### Cat
+
+The `key cat` command copies a specific Ozone key to standard output.
+
+***Params:***
+
+| Arguments                      |  Comment                                |
+|--------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|
+|  Uri                           | The name of the key in **/volume/bucket/key** format.
+
+
+{{< highlight bash >}}
+ozone sh key cat /hive/jan/hello.txt
+{{< /highlight >}}
+Copies the file hello.txt from the _/hive/jan_ bucket to standard output.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            The `key cat` command displays the contents a specific Ozone key to standard output.
          
          
            
            The `key cat` command displays the contents of a specific Ozone key to standard output.
timeline.author: dineshchitlangia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -137,3 +138,19 @@ The `key rename` command changes the name of an existing key in the specified bu
 ozone sh key rename /hive/jan sales.orc new_name.orc
 {{< /highlight >}}
 The above command will rename _sales.orc_ to _new\_name.orc_ in the bucket _/hive/jan_.
+
+### Cat
+
+The `key cat` command displays the contents a specific Ozone key to standard output.
